title: Remove mock-heavy provider integration tests
description:
{
  "priority": 3,
  "type": "test",
  "context": "tests/e2e/test_provider_integration.py has 350 LOC testing mock behavior not real integration. All providers patched with Mock(). Tests mock orchestration not actual behavior.",
  "business_context": "Removes misleading tests. Focus on real contract testing.",
  "technical_requirements": [
    "Delete mock-heavy Deepgram tests (lines 180-283)",
    "Delete mock-heavy ElevenLabs tests (lines 285-365)",
    "Delete fallback tests for dead orchestration code (lines 417-519)",
    "Keep only real provider contract tests",
    "Add provider test modes/fixtures for real testing"
  ],
  "success_criteria": [
    "~350 LOC of mock tests removed",
    "Only real integration tests remain",
    "Tests verify actual provider contracts",
    "No false confidence from mocked behavior"
  ]
}

parsed_description.context: tests/e2e/test_provider_integration.py has 350 LOC testing mock behavior not real integration. All providers patched with Mock(). Tests mock orchestration not actual behavior.
